about_the_game:
Take the game for a test run while we're tweaking the final build.
Contents are the same as the Tokyo Game Show 2018 build, but with adjustments based on feedback and new additions such as online leaderboards.
In addition, save data, stats and points earned will carry over to the full game!

Demo Features


  • Stage 1 and 2, completely uncut!
  • Full online leaderboard functions available
  • Tons of changes and tweaks since the last public build
  • Save data can be used for additional unlocks in the full game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7,Windows 8
  • Processor: 2+ GHZ
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader model 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo sound
  • Additional Notes: Steam connection required for online leaderboards
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: 3+ GHZ
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader model 4.0
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Stereo sound
  • Additional Notes: Steam connection required for online leaderboards

short_description: A last ditch effort to destroy what was once to be our savior. A final mission to eliminate a disastrous future. A single ship against Earth’s entire military. The Andraste is the only hope to defeat...the Devil Engine.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese
